item.description:
Hello all,

I'm happy to announce a special guest for tonight’s meetup: Marilyn Santiesteban.

Marylin is Director of Career Services at King & Bishop, and has years of experience working with organizations and people in transition, giving her a unique perspective with many practical ideas on how to present and work with information during a job search. Marilyn also runs a successful jobseeker networking group of her own, the "Create the Opportunity" Meetup Group in Waltham, which you can also check out at: (www.meetup.com/opportunity).

Assuming Marilyn’s 4G internet connection is working properly, she'll give us a live walk-through of a some top social networking sites to demonstrate ways to kick your search into warp speed using social media!

Alternatively (barring an internet connection), Marilyn will be happy to introduce us to her Rules for the 21st Century Job Search: an empowering path to re-employment using brain science." Fascinating stuff!

I hope you can join us, and look forward to seeing you there!
;-> Ben
------------------------------------------------
Tonight’s Agenda:
6:00 - 6:30 pm: Refreshments and networking
6:30 – 7:00 pm: Individual introductions to the group (who you are / what you're looking for)
7:00 - 7:30 pm: Marilyn’s presentation
7:30 - 8:00 pm: Q & A / more networking & information exchange
If you're a hiring manager, recruiter, or entrepreneur looking to hire staff, please feel free to bring along handouts about your company and open positions and/or business cards.
_________________________________
A note about parking: There are metered public lots on Green Street (the block behind Tavern in the Square. While those meters only allow for 2-hour parking until 6:00 pm, right at 6:00 pm they switch to 4-hour parking—so if you’re driving, we’ll understand if you show up a few minutes late!
item.how_to_find_us: In the large function room behind the bar
item.why: We're a group of IT professionals and job seekers who meet on the 4th Wednesday of every month at the Tavern in the Square, in Central Square, Cambridge

group.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston (Java, .NET, SQL, LAMP, etc.)

item.name: IT Job Seekers Greater Boston - Monthly Meetup
